Package org.ncgr.gwas

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GFFLoader
    Loads a GFF file and provides handy methods.
    GFFSearcher
    Searches a GFF file for features that span given locations.
    SegSplitter
    Simply splits a segregation file into separate files per chromosome, to ease loading into R.
    SNPComparer
    Compares SNPs between a "source" VCF showing SNPs on the source genome, a remap/liftover GFF that maps "target" genes back to the "source" genome, a target GFF for the target genome genes, and a target VCF showing SNPs on the target genome.
    SNPFilter
    Filters SNPs that appear in the first and second VCF files but NOT in the third VCF file.
    SNPLifter
    Performs SNP liftover based on rs# from an existing VCF file using snpBatch files downloaded from NCBI dbSNP.
    SNPReadCounter
    Retrieves read counts from a VCF file at locations given by an input text file which contains a list of genes, then totals the counts for all locations within a given gene and outputs that gene's totals.
    VCFLoader
    Loads a VCF file and provides handy methods.
    VCFSegregation
    Loads a VCF file and computes segregation between the case and control samples using Fisher's exact test.
    VCFSegSubjects
    Loads a VCF file and spits out the subject IDs with case or control status using the same inputs as VCFSegregation.
